name: Adopt Me!
storyline: The original focus of the game was a role-play wherein players pretended to be either a parent adopting a child, or a child getting adopted, but as the game was developed, its focus shifted to adopting and caring for virtual pets, which can be traded with other players.
summary: Adopt Me! revolves around adopting and caring for a variety of different types of pets, which hatch from eggs. Specific eggs hatch different pets. A Starter Egg, which is given to a player when they begin to play for the first time, for example hatches only a dog or a cat.
